titleStmt.title: A panegyric on our late sovereign Lady Mary Queen of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland, of glorious and immortal memory who died at Kensington, on the 28th of December, 1694 / by James Abbadie ...
Panegyrique de Marie, reine d'Agleterre, d'Ecosse, de France, et d'Irlande. English
titleStmt.author: Abbadie, Jacques, 1654-1727.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
